MEM
===

# Available modules


The overview below shows which MEM installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using MEM, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load MEM/20191023-foss-2020a-R-4.0.0
```
